name: Knockout Ninjas
description:
A fast paced party game supporting up to 4 players!

Hint: The 'MODE' button will reconfigure the controller.

  • DEATH DROP: dodge deadly falling blocks and push your friends into them!
  • BOMB: pass the bomb to another player before it explodes!
  • ROCKET: dodge the rocket for as long as you can!
  • SPIKEBALL:  dodge the spikeball longer than anyone else!
  • BASKETBALL: shoot as many hoops as you can before the time runs out! (double-tap the jump button to shoot)
  • SHURIKEN: take out the other players with your shuriken! (double-tap the jump button to shoot)
  • ZONE: make sure you're in a safe zone before the time runs out!
  • BLACKHOLE: dodge an ever expanding blackhole while trying to knock your friends into it ;)

Go fullscreen using Chrome browser for the best experience.

Stay tuned for updates!

I was inspired by the excellent Move or Die.

Developed with the LÖVE framework and the lua programming language.

Code, art, music and sound by arqitech.
